summary: A data container that encapsulates molecular diffusion and mechanical dispersion properties for solute transport modeling, holding effective diffusion coefficients and direction‑dependent longitudinal and transverse dispersivities (including optional vertical components) and providing options to toggle advanced 3‑D dispersion calculations and input validation.
business_intent: Allow scientists and engineers to define, manage, and validate the physical dispersion parameters of a medium so that transport simulations can accurately represent solute spreading under various flow orientations.
